effects: Physical damage (3.5x, ATK) to one enemy

Gain access to following skills:
	Demolish+1 (504650)
	Dragon Foot+1 (704270)

Gain 4 uses of the following skills for one turn:
	Demolish+1 (504650)
name: Demolish
Demolish
破碎拳
파쇄권
Démolition
Demolieren
Demolición
desc_short: Damage one enemy, enable perfect balance for one turn, and enable demolish or dragon foot to be used once
攻擊1名敵人+1回合內可以使用「震腳」+可以使用1次「破碎拳」或是「雙龍腳」
적 1명에게 피해+방어력과 정신력 감소+1턴 동안 '진각' 사용 가능+'파쇄권', '쌍룡각' 중 하나를 1회 사용 가능
Fügt einem Gegner Schaden zu, ermöglicht eine Runde lang Improvisation + ermöglicht einmalige Anwendung von Demolieren oder Drachentritt.
Daña a un enemigo, aprende Equilibrio exquisito durante un turno y puede usar Demolición o Talón de dragón una vez
